title: Chinese accepting Islam During the Question & Answer Session of Dr Zakir Naik in Nairobi, Kenya
transcript: so do you want to accept Islam yes okay you know the brothers they are very happy because we have about 2 billion people in the world and here there are about maybe 15 20,000 Muslims So when you say you became a Muslim they want to welcome you to the fold of Islam I will say the same thing what I said in in English I'll say in Arabic you can repeat after me same thing what I explained in English I say in Arabic you can repeat it [Music] muhamd you become Muslim
